```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r Libraries}
library(dbplyr)
library(MASS)


#graphics
library(ggplot2) #graphing 
library(DT) 


#data
smok = read.csv("data/Birthweight_reduced_kg_R.csv")
```



```{r}
dim(smok)

summary(smok)

str(smok)


which(is.na(smok))
```

```{r}
plot(smok$Birthweight, smok$Gestation )

plot(smok$smoker, smok$Birthweight)

```


```{r}
#means plot with confidence intervals 
plotmeans(Birthweight~smoker,data=smok,xlab="Status",ylab="Mean Birth Weight", main="Birth Weights: Smoking vs Non Smoking Mothers",legends=c("Non-Smoker","Smoker"),lwd=2,barwidth=2) 
```
